about_the_game:
Grow your army and defend against waves of enemies with weaponized plants in this tower defense roguelike.

In Seeb Defender, you'll face off against waves of enemies with a unique army: weaponized plants! Fight and grow your way through procedurally generated levels while unlocking new genes and upgrades for your plant army. With realistic growth mechanics, expansive genetic upgrade trees, and a variety of factors to consider when choosing your plants, Seeb Defender is a fresh take on the tower defense genre.



Key Features:
  • Weaponized Plants: Grow and command an army of procedurally generated, weaponized plants to defend against waves of enemies
  • Realistic Growth Mechanics: Each leaf collects sunlight, which drives growth in nearby areas of the plant. Water is drawn through roots. Watch as your plants grow right in front of your eyes
  • Genetic Upgrade Trees: Spend gene points to unlock new and novel genes, and irradiate seeds to gain access to the novel genes by randomizing the genes in existing seeds
  • Expansive Plant Selection: Choose plants based on how efficiently they gather sunlight, the number of weapons they have, how big they are, and many other factors
  • Challenging Levels: Fight through procedurally generated levels and face off against waves of enemies with increasing difficulty
  • Replayability: With the randomized nature of the genetic upgrades and procedurally generated levels, Seeb Defender offers endless replayability


Seeb Defender offers a unique twist on the tower defense genre with its weaponized plants, realistic growth mechanics, and expansive genetic upgrade tree. With challenging levels and endless replayability, you'll always have a reason to come back for more. Will you grow the ultimate plant army and defend against the waves of enemies? The choice is yours in Seeb Defender.

name: Seeb Defender

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-12100F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13400F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Experience realistic plant growth as you fight off waves of enemies with genetically upgraded weaponized plants. Customize your arsenal and conquer the garden in this unique tower defense rougelike
